summary: We all love the helmet that has been so closely associated to the dovahkiin. This mod makes it stronger so you don\'t have to choose a crappy looking helmet for more protection.
descriptionHtml:
DEDICATED TO ZigZagZero

We have all seen and know that the dovahkiin wears the iron helmet. We were also upset to find out the helmet isn\'t that strong in game. This mod simply amps up the armor rating from 15 to 21. It\'s one point shy from being just as strong as the Dragonplate helmet. I didn\'t want to make it an unstoppable item, but I did want to make it stronger. Enjoy.

To install, take the .esp and move it to your /data folder. Activate the mod when the launch screen appears by clicking on \"data\" then checking the .esp.

ENJOY!

I have also included the draugr helmet for ZigZagZero because I thought that was the dovahkiin helmet at first. Come to find out he wore the iron helmet so I made that one and uploaded it later.

So now the download included 2 files. The Iron / Dovahkiin helmet, and the draugr helmet both amped up to 21 armor rating vs. 15 so we don\'t have to get rid of it when we start to fight higher level monsters.
author: Ender
